name: Freddy's Timer
description:
The Game is also available on gamejolt too

RELEASE DATA:

March 25

ANDROID PORT RELEASE DATA:

April 14 (at 1:05 pm)



Note: This is an alternative version of the Fredbear's Family Diner events. You are an investigator who comes to a place known as Freddy's Family Diner to figure out what happened to the missing children and where they are; which makes you come up with a decision to spend a week to watch this place.
